con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createWebHookNotification> <!--Optional:--> <notification code="${#TestSuite#ticket}_webhook"> <classNameFilter>org.meveo.model.billing.OneShotChargeInstance</classNameFilter> <eventTypeFilter>CREATED</eventTypeFilter> <!--Optional:--> <elFilter>#{event.code eq '935_OS1' and event.subscription.offer.provider.getCode() eq 'DEMO'}</elFilter> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <host>localhost</host> <port>8080</port> <page>meveo</page> <httpMethod>HTTP_GET</httpMethod> <!--Optional:--> <username>meveo.admin</username> <!--Optional:--> <password>meveo.admin</password> <params> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <entry> <!--Optional:--> <key>param1</key> <!--Optional:--> <value>#{event.subscription}</value> </entry> <entry> <!--Optional:--> <key>param2</key> <!--Optional:--> <value>#{event.subscription.serviceInstances}</value> </entry> </params> </notification> </ws:createWebHookNotification> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
